00015 // 2D Vector / Matrix class
00016 // Created 20/11/01
00017 // By Jason Boettcher

00020 #ifndef __CVEC_H__
00021 #define __CVEC_H__
00022 
00023 #include <cmath>
00024 
00025 template<typename _T>
00026 struct VectorD2 {
00027  // Constructor
00028  VectorD2() : x(0), y(0) {}
00029  VectorD2(_T _x, _T _y) : x(_x), y(_y) {}
00030  
00031  
00032  // Attributes
00033  _T x, y;
00034  
00035  
00036  // Methods
00037  
00038  template<typename _T2>
00039  VectorD2(const _T2& cp) {
00040   x = (_T)cp.x; y = (_T)cp.y;
00041  }
00042  
00043  float GetLength() const { return sqrtf((float)x*x + (float)y*y); }
00044  _T GetLength2() const { return x*x + y*y; };
00045  
00046  float GetAngle() const { return (float)atan2((float)y,(float)x); }
00047  
00048  VectorD2 Normalize() { return *this/GetLength(); }
00049  
00050  _T Scalar(const VectorD2& vec) const { return x*vec.x + y*vec.y; }
00051  
00052  VectorD2 orthogonal() const { return VectorD2(y, -x); }
00053  
00054  _T Cross(const VectorD2& oth) const { return x * oth.y - y * oth.x; }
00055  
00056  // Overloads
00057  VectorD2 operator*(const float scalar) const {  
00058   return VectorD2(x*scalar,y*scalar);
00059  }
00060  VectorD2 operator*(const int scalar) const {  
00061   return VectorD2(x*scalar,y*scalar);
00062  }
00063  /*
00064   VectorD2 operator*(const VectorD2& vec) const {
00065   // WARNING: this doesn't make any sense (in most 'mathematical' cases)
00066   // TODO: why is it here? I would expect dot product or cross product...
00067   return VectorD2(x*vec.x,y*vec.y);
00068   }
00069   */
00070  VectorD2 operator/(const float scalar) const {  
00071   return VectorD2(x/scalar,y/scalar);
00072  }
00073  VectorD2 operator/(const int scalar) const {  
00074   return VectorD2(x/scalar,y/scalar);
00075  }
00076  VectorD2 operator+(const VectorD2& vec) const {
00077   return VectorD2(x+vec.x,y+vec.y);
00078  }
00079  VectorD2 operator-(const VectorD2& vec) const {
00080   return VectorD2(x-vec.x,y-vec.y);
00081  }
00082  VectorD2 operator-() const {
00083   return VectorD2(-x,-y);
00084  }
00085  VectorD2& operator+=(const VectorD2& vec) {
00086   x+=vec.x; y+=vec.y;
00087   return *this;
00088  }
00089  VectorD2& operator-=(const VectorD2& vec) {
00090   x-=vec.x; y-=vec.y;
00091   return *this;
00092  }
00093  VectorD2& operator*=(const float scalar) {
00094   x*=scalar; y*=scalar;
00095   return *this;
00096  }
00097  VectorD2& operator*=(const int scalar) {
00098   x*=scalar; y*=scalar;
00099   return *this;
00100  }
00101  
00102  template<typename _T2>
00103  bool operator<(const VectorD2<_T2> & op) const {
00104   return ((y == op.y && (x < op.x))
00105     || y < op.y);
00106  }
00107  
00108  template<typename _T2>
00109  bool operator==(const VectorD2<_T2> & op) const {
00110   return (x==op.x && y==op.y);
00111  }
00112  
00113  template<typename _T2>
00114  bool operator!=(const VectorD2<_T2> & op) const {
00115   return (x!=op.x || y!=op.y);
00116  }
00117  
00118  template<typename _T2>
00119  bool operator<=(const VectorD2<_T2> & op) const {
00120   return ((*this < op) || (*this == op));
00121  }
00122  
00123 };
00124 
00125 template<typename _T>
00126 struct VectorD2__absolute_less {
00127  VectorD2<_T> zero;
00128  VectorD2__absolute_less(VectorD2<_T> z = VectorD2<_T>(0,0)) : zero(z) {}
00129  
00130  bool operator()(const VectorD2<_T> v1, const VectorD2<_T> v2) const {
00131   return (v1-zero).GetLength2() < (v2-zero).GetLength2();
00132  }
00133 };
00134 
00135 
00136 
00137 typedef VectorD2<float> CVec;
00138 
00139 template<typename _T>
00140 struct MatrixD2 {
00141  VectorD2<_T> v1;
00142  VectorD2<_T> v2;
00143  
00144  MatrixD2() {}
00145  MatrixD2(_T f) { v1.x = f; v2.y = f; }
00146  MatrixD2(_T x1, _T y1, _T x2, _T y2) : v1(x1,y1), v2(x2,y2) {}
00147  MatrixD2(const VectorD2<_T>& _v1, const VectorD2<_T>& _v2) : v1(_v1), v2(_v2) {}
00148  static MatrixD2 Rotation(_T x, _T y) { return MatrixD2(x,y,-y,x); }
00149  
00150  template<typename _T2> bool operator==(const MatrixD2<_T2>& m) const { return v1 == m.v1 && v2 == m.v2; }
00151  template<typename _T2> bool operator!=(const MatrixD2<_T2>& m) const { return !(*this == m); }
00152  
00153  VectorD2<_T> operator*(const VectorD2<_T>& v) const {
00154   return VectorD2<_T>( v1.x * v.x + v2.x * v.y, v1.y * v.x + v2.y * v.y );
00155  }
00156  
00157  MatrixD2<_T> operator*(const MatrixD2<_T>& m) const {
00158   return MatrixD2<_T>( *this * m.v1, *this * m.v2 );
00159  }
00160  
00161  MatrixD2<_T>& operator*=(const MatrixD2<_T>& m) {
00162   return *this = *this * m;
00163  }
00164 };
00165

00167 
00168 #endif  //  __CVEC_H__
